snippet.title: One Week at Flumpty's (Official)
snippet.description:
[EDIT] Now that it's April 2nd, I want to clarify that THIS VIDEO is the official, canonical One Week at Flumpty's, despite also being an April Fools' prank.  This video isn't a trailer, and OWAF isn't a game, it's just this video.

When I learned everyone's favorite egg-related holiday was on April 1st this year, I couldn't pass up that opportunity to make a stupid, misleading Flumpty-related creation.

Plus, I've always felt a little bad about the time I hastily announced OWAF and later cancelled it.  So, like Riddle Transfer 2, I decided to finish it in a very different way from what I initially intended.  I had fun.  Hope you did, too!
---
Original description:
"This Easter, the egg is back from the dead.

For more information, visit https://bit.ly/1gho7il

Playlist: https://tinyurl.com/onafplaylist
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/@Jonochrome
